scripts.start: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && node index.js
scripts.start-dev: cd frontend && npm run build-dev && cd .. && node index.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.importantComment: // wrong kiya h mene ,mene bhale hi npm start m npm run build kra rha hu pr npm run build kese chlega,local m to chljaega pr deploy krte waqt unke server m kese chlega,uske liye frontend ka npm i hona jaroori h tabhi to use node modules me se  usko build cmd milegi, herokupostuild  bhi dekhle chahe npm run build se phele npm i h, isliye simple npm start m node index rakh ,jisse deploy m dikkt na ho or han deploy se phele npm run build krlio phir push krio git m ,baki npm start dev likhi ren e local m chlane m or scripts samajhne m asani hogi age bhul gya to
